PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-11212020-12-18,  ,  ,  ,  TC,  APA,  ,  , 
ActPilotage Act
SubjectAtlantic Pilotage Authority's borrowing Limit ** Increase **
PrecisOrder (1) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2020-33 of January 30, 2020; and (2) fixing the maximum amount of money that can be borrowed by the ATLANTIC PILOTAGE AUTHORITY, in Canada or elsewhere for the purpose of defraying its expenses at $20,000,000.
AttachmentsAttachment
